config.installCommand: echo 'registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/' > .npmrc && echo 'always-auth=false' >> .npmrc && echo '@anthropic-ai:registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/' >> .npmrc && git config --global url."https://github.com/".insteadOf "git@github.com:" && git config --global url."https://".insteadOf "git://" && NPM_CONFIG_GIT_PROTOCOL=https NPM_CONFIG_GIT_TAGGING_SYSTEM=semver npm install --no-git-tag-version --no-save
config.buildCommand: sh -c 'node -e "const fs=require(\"fs\");const path=require(\"path\");const symlinkPath=path.join(process.cwd(),\"public\",\"Original\");try{const stats=fs.lstatSync(symlinkPath);if(stats.isSymbolicLink()){console.log(\"Found symlink at:\",symlinkPath);fs.unlinkSync(symlinkPath);console.log(\"Removed symlink\");}}catch(e){console.log(\"No symlink found or other error:\",e.message);}try{fs.mkdirSync(symlinkPath,{recursive:true});console.log(\"Created directory:\",symlinkPath);}catch(e){console.error(\"Error creating directory:\",e.message);};"; DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true npm run build'
